subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort was built by Rao Jodha?
question_hi: राव जोध ने किस मंगल बनाया है ?
explanation_en:
Jaigarh Fort, also known as the Chittorgarh Fort, was built by Rao Jodha.
In Hindi: जयगरख फोट, लेकिन शीतोगढ़ फोट, Rao Jodha ko niyamit kiya gaya hai.
explanation_hi: Rao Jodha ka Chittorgarh Fort, शीतोगढ़ फोट, Rao Jodha ko niyamit kiya gaya hai.
